RecordOperationSpec.Name: Update Website Reserved Children to CCH Verified
RecordOperationSpec.Description: Update Website Reserved Children to CCH Verified
RecordOperationSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPOperationImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_UPDATEWEBSITERESERVEDTOCCHVERIFIED ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier ) as begin --check deletion rules, if any
update ch_ext set ch_ext.CCHVALIDATED = 1 from dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION ch_ext join SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = ch_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID where so.RESERVATIONKEYID in (select ID from SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYRESERVEPROCESS where NAME in ('Website', 'Website B', 'Website C', 'Website D'))
end
